New Records: Shohei Ohtani hit his 53rd home run
Mookie Betts hit a walk-off home run
Key Match Events: Colorado Rockies jumped out to a 3-0 lead
The Dodgers scored three runs in the seventh to pull within 5-4
Back-to-back ninth-inning home runs by Ohtani and Betts
Pre-Game Insights: No pre-game insights provided in the article
Post-Match Reflections: Shohei Ohtani improved his batting average to.301
Ohtani scored two runs in the game to raise his season run total to 128, one more than the previous single-season high by a Japanese player
Miscellaneous Highlights: Yoshinobu Yamamoto gave up five hits and walked three in three innings of work
The Dodgers stayed three games behind the Padres in the National League West
Others: Yu Darvish fanned nine in the game
Shota Imanaga won his sixth consecutive start
